data.title: Timothy Dalton
data.meta_description: A lean, hard-edged leading man of stage and screen, Timothy Dalton is best known for playing movie superspy James Bond. Classically trained at the Royal Academy of Dramatic Art, Timothy Dalton first appeared on film with Peter O'Toole and Katharine Hepburn in The Lion in Winter (1968).
data.text:
Actor

Place Of Birth:

Colwyn Bay, Wales

Best Known As:

James Bond in the 1987 film The Living Daylights

A lean, hard-edged leading man of stage and screen, Timothy Dalton is best known for playing movie superspy James Bond. Classically trained at the Royal Academy of Dramatic Art, Timothy Dalton first appeared on film with Peter O'Toole and Katharine Hepburn in The Lion in Winter (1968). Two decades later, Dalton followed Roger Moore in the role of Bond, playing Agent 007 in The Living Daylights (1987). After a second Bond film, License to Kill (1989, with Wayne Newton), he stepped down and was followed in turn by Pierce Brosnan.

Extra Credit

Timothy Dalton played Rhett Butler in the 1994 TV miniseries Scarlett.
